title: GTBH Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 35 Senior Resident Posts
description: The Guru Teh Bahadur Hospital (GTBH) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 35 Senior Resident Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ MBBS, MDS, Post-graduation, DNB, PGDM can apply for the GTBH Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode.
